content:
Hoy las veganas llamamos a que se consuma el primer derecho y el más importantes de las demás animales: la #libertad, que no sean esclavas, que no se les explote, que vivan bajo sus propios términos.

El objetivo del veganismo es emancipar a las demás animales.

El sujeto político del veganismo son las demás animales sintientes (casi todos).

¿Por qué digo "las"?
Porque son las personas no humanas.

¿Por qué la libertad es el más importante derecho ético? Porque sin ella pueden hacer con nosotros lo que quieran los amos.

1 de noviembre día del #veganismo.

#GoVegan
#veganism

account.note:
Terrícola; estoy en esta red social porque busco libertad y para difundir una de mis misiones: fin a la esclavitud de todos los animales.

¡Libertad a los animales no humanos!, y a los animales humanos, por supuesto.

Por favor, antes de pedirme seguimiento, habla conmigo.

media_attachments.description:
Cóndor andino volando en libertad bajo el cielo azul.

Ave grande, con sus alas extendidas.

content:
I am a day late in my timezone but Happy World Vegan Day everyone! ☺️❤️🌱🥳🪅🎊🎉

Celebrations involved buying a box of #vegan #krispykreme donuts! 😂 I got them from my local #7eleven.

I believe they were released in #Australia on World Vegan Day too!

I have forgotten what non vegan donuts taste like, but these were delicious! Highly recommended. Curious if people can taste the difference. ☺️

#vegans #veganism #AnimalRights #veganFood #veganForTheAnimals #GoVegan

-------------------
PS. I was going to just post this picture and be done with it, but I won't be an #AnnoyingVegan without giving a thousand words of backstory as to why these donuts actually make me a bit happier than just for the fact that they are vegan, donuts, and are edible (all things that excite me very much 😂). No, these donuts actually represent a little bit of progress, and while I am 99.99% sure it had nothing to do with me, it feels nice to imagine and pretend the fact that these donuts are now on sale in Australia due to my pestering. So on the bird site, this is the exchange I had with Krispy Kreme UK a year and a bit ago:

-Me: "Someone bought Krispy Kreme donuts at the office today and I missed out. But it's ok, it was worth it.

Hey @ krispykremeUK, can you tell the Australian division to make vegan options? 🌱"

*Picture of Lisa Simpsons looking at the inside of her home while a group of people watch the boxing game with stolen cable*

-Krispykreme: "Oh noooo! What would your dream doughnut be? 👀"

-M: "Thank you so much for your response. A vegan Krispy Kreme with Oreo would blow my mind! 😋😍

I know us Australians are a bit behind the times but if you can give your former colony a gentle kick in the bum, the vegans in Australia would much appreciate it! 😂"

*Gif of Homer Simpsons about to boot a judge or barrister in that episode where they go to Australia*

-K: "We'll be sure to pass your suggestions over to our team 😉"

-M: "Thank you so much! 🌱🐮🐄🐣"

-M: "The best part is, I would be incredibly surprised if (done in a double blind randomised fashion 👩‍🔬🧑‍🔬🔬👨‍💻), that any person would be able to distinguish a Krispy Kreme Donut with or without chicken eggs or cow milk. So the taste & that delicious donut will still be there!🤣🍩"
-------------------

Header: King of the animals—as thou hast described him—I should rather say king of the beasts, thou being the greatest—because thou hast spared slaying them, in order that they may give thee their children for the benefit of the gullet, of which thou hast attempted to make a sepulchre for all animals; and I would say still more, if it were allowed me to speak the entire truth. Leonardo da Vinci

card.description: Share with your friendThe Body Shop is the first global brand to take its skincare expertise and apply it to create beauty products that are both efficacious and socially responsible. card.title: Cansu Yersal Quotes | YourQuote
card.description:
Cansu Yersal quotes. Hello all! I am Cansu Yersal, from Turkey. I am an article writer @Humanities Institute and a philosopher. I hold a BA in philosophy & humanities from Boğaziçi University (2016—2020). I am vegan since 10/2021. My interests include Ancient Egypt; Buddhism, Jainism, and Taoism; Logic, Mathematics; Sciences. I speak English🇺🇸, Turkish🇹🇷, German🇩🇪, and a little bit of Italian🇮🇹.

I am using YourQuote to spread veganism and write some wisdom quotes about life, universe, and everything.

Read my articles:
https://www.humanitiesinstitute.org/germanycinema/
